utility

Class MaintenanceTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.MaintenanceTracker

  • public class MaintenanceTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for tracking automobiles and automobile maintenance

      • getInstance

        public static MaintenanceTracker getInstance()
        Singleton pattern method to return an instance of the maintenance tracker
        Returns:

      • addAutomobile

        public void addAutomobile(java.lang.String type,
                          java.lang.String make,
                          java.lang.String model,
                          int year,
                          java.lang.String colour,
                          double odometerReading,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String owner)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method to add an automobile to the tracker by parameters. The type parameter determines the type of vehicle. The type parameter values are found in static fields in the Automobile class.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of vehicle (electric, gas, or diesel)
        make - Make of vehicle
        model - Model of vehicle
        year - Year of vehicle
        colour - Colour of vehicle
        odometerReading - Odometer reading of vehicle
        name - Name of vehicle
        owner - Name of owner of vehicle
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type is not one of electric, gas, or diesel

      • getAutomobileById

        public Automobile getAutomobileById(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the automobile with ID matching the ID paramter
        Parameters:
        id - ID of automobile to fetch
        Returns:
        Automobile found, or null if not found

      • removeAutomobileById

        public Automobile removeAutomobileById(java.lang.String id)
        Removes an automobile from the tracker by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of automobile to remove
        Returns:
        Automobile removed, or null if not found

      • updateAutomobile

        public Automobile updateAutomobile(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String make,
                                   java.lang.String model,
                                   int year,
                                   java.lang.String colour,
                                   double odometerReading,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String owner)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Updates a vehicle matching the ID in the id parameter of the method. Updates all values to match those given in this method.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of automobile to be changed
        make - Make of automobile to be changed
        model - Model of automobile to be changed
        year - Model year of automobile to be chanegd
        colour - Colour of automobile to be changed
        odometerReading - Odometer reading of automobile to be changed
        name - Name of automobile to be changed
        owner - Owner of automobile to be changed
        Returns:
        Automobile that has been updated, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if make or model is null, odometer reading is less than 0, or year is less than 1900

      • getMaintenanceItemById

        public MaintenanceItem getMaintenanceItemById(java.lang.String itemId)
        Returns a maintenance item in the tracker by its ID
        Parameters:
        itemId - ID of item to retrieve
        Returns:
        Maintenance item with matching ID, or null if not found

      • removeMaintenanceItemById

        public MaintenanceItem removeMaintenanceItemById(java.lang.String itemId)
        Removes a maintenance item from the tracker with matching ID
        Parameters:
        itemId - ID of item to be removed
        Returns:
        Maintenance item removed, or null if not found

      • loadAutomobileList

        public void loadAutomobileList(java.util.List<Automobile> list)
        Loads a list of automobiles to the tracker. Replaces any items that existed in the list previously.
        Parameters:
